org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.values.dates

Class Value

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pragmaticminds.crunch.api.values.dates.Value
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanValue, DateValue, DoubleValue, LongValue, StringValue

    @Entity
public abstract class Value
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Entities to store single "values" with different types. In Jpa Inheritance has to be used.

    Taken from the CRUNCH Project.

    Author:
    julian
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • of

        public static Value of(Object o)
        checks if the Object is assignable to one of the classes Boolean, Date, Double, Long or String and creates a Value object which is returned. If this is not possible a ClassCastException will be thrown
        Parameters:
        o - the Object to be transformed into a Value object
        Returns:
        the Value the element of the map at the given key is transformed to

      • getAsDataType

        public Object getAsDataType(DataType dataType)
        Returns the requested value in the requested DataType (if possible).
        Parameters:
        dataType - DataType to transform to
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the cast cannot be done
